description: This file provides utility functions to extract and format version information from a given info dictionary, either by parsing a version list or string and returning a normalized list or string representation.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts the version as a list of three integers (major, minor, patch) from the input info dictionary. Handles different formats (list or string) and provides default version numbers if missing.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns the version as a dot-separated string by calling GetVersion and joining its components.
